title: Gamification design to enhance engagement in engineering mathematics learning

context.prior_knowledge: Undergraduate-level mathematics knowledge and engineering problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Integration of gamification elements using personal devices (BYOD), emphasizing collaborative activities linked to project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Students perform at least three voluntary learning activities per week through a gamification system.
Achieve a retention rate of 20% or higher over four weeks in learning engagement metrics (login frequency, content interaction count).
Demonstrate an 80% or higher task completion rate in gamified math problem-solving that includes elements like badges, leaderboards, and missions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
